NORTH CAROLINA FARM BUREAU MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff,
v.
Jeremiah JARVIS, Melissa Shuler, Jarrett Lance Carland, Elana Barnett Carland, and Nationwide Property and Casualty Insurance Company, Defendants. No. COA15-364. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Nov. 17, 2015.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed.
